#### Example

```{r, results='asis'}
library(r2social)
r2social.scripts()
shareButton(link = "http://rpkg.net", position = "left")
shareButton(link = "http://obianom.com", position = "right")
shareButton(link = "http://66pharm.com", position = "inline")
```
